name: monke
description: To make it easy for you to get started with GitLab, here's a list of recommended next steps.

scripts.start: npm run install && npm run build && node server/bin/www.js
scripts.install: cd ./client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i

author: Rim Dallali, Andrew Trinh, Katharina Orfanidis, Christopher Hu, Mauricio Murillo
